PENTAGON

Introduction

Yang Hongseok is a South Korean singer and actor best known as the lead vocalist of PENTAGON. He is currently under ANDMARQ after parting ways with Cube Entertainment.

Before debuting, Hongseok gained recognition for his participation in YG Entertainment's survival show MIX & MATCH in 2014, where he competed as a member of TEAM B but was eliminated in the final episode. He left YG Entertainment in 2015 and later joined Cube Entertainment, where he participated in Pentagon Maker in 2016 and secured a spot in PENTAGON’s final lineup. He officially debuted with the group on October 10, 2016, with the mini-album PENTAGON.

In addition to his music career, Hongseok ventured into acting, making his debut in the 2017 film The Love That’s Left. On November 6, 2023, Cube Entertainment announced that he had decided not to renew his contract. While he is no longer under Cube, he remains an active member of PENTAGON.
